argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_refld | |- RRfld e. Field |
| 2 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( RRfld e. Field <-> ( RRfld e. DivRing /\ RRfld e. CRing ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simplbi | |- ( RRfld e. Field -> RRfld e. DivRing ) |
| 4 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( RRfld e. DivRing -> RRfld e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_mp2b | |- RRfld e. Ring |
| 6 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( RRfld e. Ring -> RRfld e. Grp ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- RRfld e. Grp |
| 8 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( RRfld e. Grp -> RRfld e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- RRfld e. Mnd |
| 10 |  | #P_retos | |- RRfld e. Toset |
| 11 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ ( b e. RR /\ c e. RR /\ a <_ b ) ) -> a e. RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr1 | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ ( b e. RR /\ c e. RR /\ a <_ b ) ) -> b e. RR ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr2 | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ ( b e. RR /\ c e. RR /\ a <_ b ) ) -> c e. RR ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpr3 | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ ( b e. RR /\ c e. RR /\ a <_ b ) ) -> a <_ b ) |
| 15 | 11, 12, 13, 14 | #P_leadd1dd | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ ( b e. RR /\ c e. RR /\ a <_ b ) ) -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3anassrs | |- ( ( ( ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR ) /\ c e. RR ) /\ a <_ b ) -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_ex | |- ( ( ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR ) /\ c e. RR ) -> ( a <_ b -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3impa | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR /\ c e. RR ) -> ( a <_ b -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rgen3 | |- A. a e. RR A. b e. RR A. c e. RR ( a <_ b -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_rebase | |- RR = ( Base ` RRfld ) |
| 21 |  | #P_replusg | |- + = ( +g ` RRfld ) |
| 22 |  | #P_rele2 | |- <_ = ( le ` RRfld ) |
| 23 | 20, 21, 22 | #P_isomnd | |- ( RRfld e. oMnd <-> ( RRfld e. Mnd /\ RRfld e. Toset /\ A. a e. RR A. b e. RR A. c e. RR ( a <_ b -> ( a + c ) <_ ( b + c ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 9, 10, 19, 23 | #P_mpbir3an | |- RRfld e. oMnd |
| 25 |  | #P_isogrp | |- ( RRfld e. oGrp <-> ( RRfld e. Grp /\ RRfld e. oMnd ) ) |
| 26 | 7, 24, 25 | #P_mpbir2an | |- RRfld e. oGrp |
| 27 |  | #P_mulge0 | |- ( ( ( a e. RR /\ 0 <_ a ) /\ ( b e. RR /\ 0 <_ b ) ) -> 0 <_ ( a x. b ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_an4s | |- ( ( ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR ) /\ ( 0 <_ a /\ 0 <_ b ) ) -> 0 <_ ( a x. b ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_ex | |- ( ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR ) -> ( ( 0 <_ a /\ 0 <_ b ) -> 0 <_ ( a x. b ) ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_rgen2a | |- A. a e. RR A. b e. RR ( ( 0 <_ a /\ 0 <_ b ) -> 0 <_ ( a x. b ) ) |
| 31 |  | #P_re0g | |- 0 = ( 0g ` RRfld ) |
| 32 |  | #P_remulr | |- x. = ( .r ` RRfld ) |
| 33 | 20, 31, 32, 22 | #P_isorng | |- ( RRfld e. oRing <-> ( RRfld e. Ring /\ RRfld e. oGrp /\ A. a e. RR A. b e. RR ( ( 0 <_ a /\ 0 <_ b ) -> 0 <_ ( a x. b ) ) ) ) |
| 34 | 5, 26, 30, 33 | #P_mpbir3an | |- RRfld e. oRing |
| 35 |  | #P_isofld | |- ( RRfld e. oField <-> ( RRfld e. Field /\ RRfld e. oRing ) ) |
| 36 | 1, 34, 35 | #P_mpbir2an | |- RRfld e. oField |
